name: Doctor Unfortunate's unfortunate event
description:
GAME WAS NOT FINISHED, MAY BE BROKEN 

IS WIP

Doctor Unfortunate was one of the best scientists in town, but he had only one problem… Unfortunately for him, he was quite unfortunate. One day doctor Unfortunate decided it’s time to stop the bad luck, and built the Probabilinator. The machine was supposed to make the most improbable thing happen, i.e. give him luck, so he went to check it in the local casino. The machine worked! But the most improbable thing to happen actually was- dealers turning into werewolfs, arcade games coming to life And a random guy named Brandon getting stuck in an 20 sided cube altered endless loop trying his very best not to die. You are Brandon. Good luck
